amendment.description: Amendment requires the Army Corps of Engineers to apply the provisions of the Clean Water Act as passed by the Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce the requirement in the Code of Federal Regulations, that activities identified in the Federal Water Pollution Control Act must be established or ongoing in order to receive an exemption under the Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A059) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 174 (Roll no. 212).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A059) offered by Mr. LaMalfa.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A059) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 174 (Roll no. 212).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
